name: Fishing Game (itch) (A_Thor)
description:
Can you fish up 79 types of fish? To fish touch the screen and , hold the rod but do not move till a fish bites, you know it bit when you see yellow orbs. tip: do not cast your rod too close to a fish, it will get scared. Fish all day and night, rain or shine in a another fun game made by Thor 2020.

The original publication can be found at https://simmer.io/@A_Thor/fishing-game ,This is just a re upload of an old game
